title: Lauren De Crescenzo, Alexey Vermeulen win The Rad Dirt Fest in Trinidad, Colorado
content:
In the women's race, Alexis Skarda and Crystal Anthony rounded out the podium, while Pete Stetina and Brendan Johnston were just behind Vermeulen in second and third place.

Read the full article at Lauren De Crescenzo, Alexey Vermeulen win The Rad Dirt Fest in Trinidad, Colorado on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
